entry.title: 3M Scotch 6307C - Restickable Glue Stick .2 oz (5.9 ml) 7000138634
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Glue Sticks
Price: 1.34

[shortdesc]

Scotch Restickable Glue Stick, 6307C, 5.9 ml (0.20 oz)

  • The Scotch® Restickable Glue Stick allows you to adjust and move bonded items after application
  • It is fast-drying and helps to eliminate the mess
  • Scotch restickable glue stick bonds to most lightweight paper, cardboard or fabrics, as well as other surfaces
  • It is repositionable after applying.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Origin Country South Korea
    Product Type Glue Sticks
    Size .2 oz, 5.9 ml

    Product Information

  • Acid free and non-toxic
  • Solid adhesive stick makes paper self-sticking, removable and repositionable
  • Restickable glue stick is safe, and fast-drying
  • Adhesive dries clear and wrinkle-free
  • Hands and household surfaces clean easily with soap and water

    • Suggested Application

  • Paper, cardboard, and fabric adhesion
  • Crafting
  • Scrapbooking

entry.title: 3M 568-24X50 - Positionable Mounting Adhesive 568 24 in x 50 Ft (60.96 cm x 12.24 m) 7100001969
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Art Supplies
Price: 118.59

[shortdesc]

3M Positionable Mounting Adhesive, 568, 24 in x 50 ft (60.96 cm x 12.24 m)

  • 3M™ Positionable Mounting Adhesive is a clean, dry, long-lasting, odourless adhesive that allows you to reposition items even after you've placed them on the substrate
  • Once your desired placement or positioning is achieved, simply apply pressure to bond the item permanently in place.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Length 50ft, 12.24m
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesive Art Supplies

    Product Information

  • Clean, dry, odourless adhesive
  • Initially repositionable
  • Excellent for sensitive papers
  • Acid-free and photo-safe

    • Suggested Application

  • Framing
  • Art mounting
    		•
